text: We have pushed x86, power and z base images v0.2.1 to hyperledger dockerhub account (<https://hub.docker.com/r/hyperledger/fabric-baseimage/tags/>)
<@U11HH3P7Y> is there any information on what's new? should 0.6 users be looking at picking these up?
will update what are the new features in this.. Seems base image release version number change patch is pending.. Once this is merged it will pick the latest base image version
<@U1MSZ37NK> v0.6 is not ready to take a baseimage upgrade, and there are no plans to port it
v0.2.1 is currently slated for integration with v1.0/master branch, as an update to v0.2.0 that is currently there
<@U0KPFAZNF> cool thanks; I'll stick with 0.1.0 then
